subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Clifford Ray won an N.B.A. championship with Golden State in 1975, but for personal achievements, it is hard to beat the day in 1978 when he reached down a dolphin’s throat and removed a life-threatening bolt.
snippet: Clifford Ray won an N.B.A. championship with Golden State in 1975, but for personal achievements, it is hard to beat the day in 1978 when he reached down a dolphin’s throat and removed a life-threatening bolt.
